content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find this apartment to be a great investment. How much were you thinking of offering for the monthly rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given the unfurnished state of the apartment and the fact that it is not particularly spacious, I was thinking of 450 euros per month. I am, however, willing to negotiate.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: 450 euros per month is a bit below my initial expectations, but I'm open to considering it. Could you tell me more about your plans for the apartment and why you think this price is fair?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, the apartment is unfurnished, so I would need to purchase furniture, which is an additional cost. Furthermore, the apartment is not particularly spacious, which could be a disadvantage for some. Therefore, I believe that 450 euros per month is a fair price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I understand your perspective, Max. However, the location of the apartment is quite central, which adds significant value. The area is known for its convenience and access to amenities. Would you be willing to increase your offer to reflect the premium location?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Of course, the location is an advantage. However, the unfurnished state of the apartment and its size are also disadvantages. Given these factors, I would be willing to increase my offer to 475 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for considering the location's advantage, Max. An offer of 475 euros per month is more in line with my expectations. Would you be willing to go a bit higher, considering the amenities and the quality of the construction?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position. Given the unfurnished state of the apartment and its size, I would be willing to increase my offer to 480 euros per month. I believe that this is a fair price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, your offer of 480 euros per month is quite close to my asking price. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Would you be willing to round up to 490 euros per month to finalize the agreement? This would be a fair deal for both parties, considering the apartment's location and the current market conditions.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [490] Euro!
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm pleased to hear that, Max. Thank you for your cooperation. We have a deal at 490 euros per month. Is there anything else you would like to discuss before we proceed with the rental agreement?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your time, Mister Schmidt. I believe that we have covered everything. I am very much looking forward to moving into the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Excellent, Max! I'm glad to hear that. The rental agreement will be sent to you shortly. Please review it and let me know if you have any questions or if there's anything else you need. Welcome to your new home!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
